H0.text: the vascular layer of the eye is the. Choroid

H1.text: the vascular layer of the eye is the. Sclera

H2.text: the vascular layer of the eye is the. Retina

H3.text: the vascular layer of the eye is the. uvea

A4.text: The uvea is the vascular middle layer of the eye.

A5.text: The uvea is the pigmented middle layer of the three concentric layers that make up an eye, precisely between the inner retina and the outer fibrous layer composed of the sclera and cornea.
